Html:
Hi Simon,
I was looking at the source of your library, HtmlNodeNavigator seems very interesting.
But I am little perplexed about its use!!! Can you provide us with a simple sample, if possible?

Thanks a lot,
Indo.

Hi,

In general, you don't use it directly. It is leveraged backstage by XPATH queries or XSLT transformations.

For example, when you do this;

HtmlNodecollection links = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes(".//a@href");

the selectNodes uses HtmlNodeNavigator...
Hope this helps
Simon.
